name: Qmod
description:
Dumb little sandbox game like Gmod.

-Mess around with physics objects with your Physics Gun.
-Spawn objects to mess around with

Controls:

-WASD to Move
-Left Click to Grab objects
-Right Click to Freeze/Unfreeze objects
-Middle Mouse Button to OBLITERATE objects.
-Q to open the Spawn Menu
-ESC to pause.
-LShift to Sprint
